text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Noble, lovely, strong! 
Gorgeous, graceful, courageous!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: That is precisely what I aspire to be——A truly stalwart princess.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Deeeryaaaaaaaーーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaah……! Kawakami-san's run looks so strong every time I 
see it……I can almost hear her heavy footsteps from here～……

text_block_list.name: Teammate B
text_block_list.text:
That powerful step is what makes her finishing leg so overwhelming. 
And so far, she has won 5 consecutive victories, including 2 G1s——

text_block_list.name: Teammate B
text_block_list.text:
Winning 3 consecutive victories from her debut, then going to 
the 『Oaks』……You remember it too, don't you? The way she won that.

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it left quite an impression……! The physicality, 
and guts needed to make it……Kawakami-san was just amazing.

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
Just like when she won the Double Tiara at the 『Shuka Sho』. Before 
the race, everyone thought it would be a showdown between three but——

text_block_list.name: Teammate B
text_block_list.text:
『In the end it seemed one-sided』……there was an article like that. 
The pace was very fast so the race ended up becoming one long sprint.

text_block_list.name: Teammate B
text_block_list.text:
Focusing on that power, led to a fairly high level 
display of strength. That is Kawakami's weapon.

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to the Tiara Rotation, her position 
as top of her generation is already secure. That's 
what it seems like, huh～……! Kawakami-san is amazing……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, phewーーー……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……Mmm. 
One more!!

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
Wah! And she's so stoic～……! The next 『Queen Elizabeth Cup』 
is already Kawakami-san's isn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Yes! I'll be the one to do it! 
A spectacular～ victory that will blow everyone away!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……now, this is the moment. As a Princess, I will do it!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
——Thank you very much for speaking with us, Kawakami Princess-san! 
It's clear that you're enthusiastic about the 『Queen Elizabeth Cup』!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
That everyone has high expectations for Kawakami-san, and that 
they're excited……it seems like I'll be able to write a good article.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, thank you very much♪ 
By all means, please do raise the excitement.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my utmost! ……especially with the 
current state of Tiara participants……people 
are feeling down because of the unfortunate news.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……Yes. Me too, honestly……it came as quite the shock.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'd heard quite a bit about it from King-san. 
That to Team <Ascella> she was someone just like the sun……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
And——for myself too. After all, it was news concerning 
last year's Unorthodox Double Crown. There isn't a 
Tiara Uma Musume around who wouldn't be moved……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: That someone like that, would now……be in that state……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ——However, that's exactly why!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The Princess I aim to be, even in that darkness, would never, 
ever give up on finding that light until the very end!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
By shining in my own way, blowing it all away! 
For everyone, I'll be the one to raise their spirits!!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess-san……! 
Yes, by all means! I'll be cheering for you……!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (That's right, I will……!! I will, without fail!!)

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text:
——Well then, let's begin our Inter-team race! 
Everyone please get in to position. Ready……Start!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (I have to win, without fail! I will——I will!!)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Alright, the last straight……Right here——!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Nuuuuuuugaaaaaaaa-!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: !! Wait——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Puhaaa……! Haa, haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Teammate A
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, um!? First place is Kawakami Princess-san……?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
……No, wait. Kawakami, the way you moved 
across the course was way too dangerous.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
If you did that in a real race, you might get penalized 
for obstruction, you know? ……Or rather, lately you——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
M-my apologies!! 
For what I've done……I'm sorry, City-san!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Doing something like that is completely unacceptable……! 
I will work on training again! Nuooooooーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait!? Aaaah……damnit.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
That girl's been working too hard lately……I wonder if she's okay. 
I need to think of a better way to follow up on her——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, now, today let's keep on training～～～! 
Today it's muscle training, sweat and strain——

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ahhh～ how troubling～!! I'm in trouble, so much trouble～!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, King-san! You really seem to be troubled 
by something……what ever is the matter!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh～ Kawakami-san, you came with the absolute perfect timing! 
What a coincidence, a wonderful coincidence!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well you see, I need to carry that cardboard box to the training 
grounds. But, right now, just a little～……um……I hurt my hip.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh how horrible!? Something like a measly cardboard box, 
you can leave to me! I can carry it on my pinky!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You will? Then, I suppose I'll leave it to you. 
……Sorry. Thank you, Kawakami-san.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Right around here is fine. 
Can I ask you to leave it there, Kawakami-san?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I understand! Nnnsho. 
……Well then, I'll take my——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Aaaaaaaaaaaaaahh……!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ! That voice just now——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Huu, huu, huu, huu…… 
Taaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(……!? W-what's going on here!? 
Pandora-san——!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Not yet! Hold, hold, hold……!! 
Uraaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(That flexibility……the length of that spurt, that speed!! 
Her running, expression, and her bearing——)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Compared to before……it's completely different……!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey, Kawakami-san.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
This……right, this isn't really advice. 
More like a 『Complaint』. So I'll say it directly to you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……You may think that you're the only one 
shouldering the expectations of victory.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
——In the first place, we weren't going to 
let you carry that on your own, you know?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: The kouhais on our team, you shouldn't underestimate them.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Haaaa……! 
Haa, haa, haa——……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……I will win. I will definitely——!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ………… How could I?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for my rudeness, King-san. 
I was being just a little……no, quite conceited.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'll be sure to engrave this in to my heart. 
At the next 『Queen Elizabeth Cup』, my greatest rival——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: That person's name, is Fusaichi Pandora!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Fufu, it seems you've understood it properly.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course! Fully!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……by the way, King-san. 
Please take good care of your hip.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Huh? ……Ah, yeah～! My hip. Ah, that's right, my hip! 
Of course I'll take care!! Yes, of course!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu! Please do. 
King-san, I hope you always remain energetic.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Always——to me, you're someone important who will always be my guide.
